definition: to stop using/to suspend/to discontinue/to disable
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Within the first year, 26% of patients 80 years of age stopped taking warfarin .
sentences.chinese: 在第一年中，80岁以上患者中有26%停用华发林。

sentences.english: Speed up boot time by disabling unused ports on your Windows machine.
sentences.chinese: 停用你机器上的无用的接口使电脑运行速度加快。

sentences.english: He had stopped diltiazem on his own accord.
sentences.chinese: 他自行停用地尔硫卓治疗。

sentences.english: If stop using over three days, the water should be let out.
sentences.chinese: 如果停用超过三天，应排干冷却水。

sentences.english: In order to reduce the potential attack surface, debugging should be disabled on production machines.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低潜在攻击面，实际执行电脑上应该停用侦错。

sentences.english: He does not recommend stop ETV even I can.
sentences.chinese: 他建议即使我能够停用恩替也不要停。
完全停用自适应I帧判定。

sentences.english: The European Union's drive to end the use of energy-wasting incandescent light bulbs will take practical effect next week.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟将从下周开始正式发起停用白炽灯泡的节能行动。

sentences.english: It is equally easy to remove or deactivate it if required.
sentences.chinese: 同样也可以根据你的需要轻松的删除或停用它。

sentences.english: Any negative psychological symptoms should disappear once you stop taking the drugs.
sentences.chinese: 一旦药物被停用，这些消极的精神症状均会消失。

sentences.english: The piston valve design ensures actuation even after many years without operation.
sentences.chinese: 旋塞阀的设计，即使在多年停用之后，也能确保启用。

sentences.english: Etanercept should be discontinued if a blood dyscrasia is evident.
sentences.chinese: 如果发生明显的血液恶液质，依那西普应当被停用。

sentences.english: Specifically to disable all the dead skin products.
sentences.chinese: 停用一切特地去死皮的产品。
蒜头车站内停用的货车群。

sentences.english: If you've been taking an antianxiety medicine for a long time, do not quit abruptly.
sentences.chinese: 如果您长期服用抗焦虑药物，不要突然停用。

definition: to prohibit the use of sth/to ban/(computing) to disable
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
